author: benh
msg: Updated to protocol buffers. (This is a massive commit, for which I apologize.)
In addition to updating the code to use protocol buffers:
(1) A new Java implementation is included (because getting protocol
buffers to work was too hard so it was finally time to leave SWIG
(2) The C API has been dropped (and is waiting for someone who wants
to do it and maintain it).
(3) The Python API has been broken. We plan on supporting it, but not

author: jdonnerstag
msg: Improved error reporting of DiskDataStoreTest a bit since I get unexpected error occasionally, not re-producible (windows XP)

author: benh
msg: Stop Mesos in the EC2 setup script before trying to launch it (so that slaves don't come up twice)

author: benh
msg: Launch nodes from all reservation IDs with a given cluster name instead
of always taking the first one.

author: benh
msg: Increased max MapReduce tasks per EC2 node to work better on c1.xlarge.
